title: Bug 5340: Cancelling add exception breakpoint has no effect
OB: When attempting to cancel adding an exception breakpoint in the breakpoints pane of the debug perspective, the cancellation has no effect.
EB: The cancellation should successfully stop the addition of the exception breakpoint.
SR:
1) Go to the breakpoints pane in the debug perspective
2) Click the J! button to add an exception
3) In the progress dialog, click cancel.
